scripts.full-deploy: npm run schema && npm run db $npm_config_stage && npm run deploy --stage=$npm_config_stage
scripts.full-deploy:dev: npm run schema && npm run db:dev && npm run deploy:dev
scripts.full-deploy:test: npm run schema && npm run db:test && npm run deploy:test
scripts.full-deploy:uat: npm run schema && npm run db:uat && npm run deploy:uat
scripts.full-deploy:live: npm run schema && npm run db:live && npm run deploy:live
